price: Mi protector es Dios, Quien reveló el Libro. Él es Quien protege a los justos.
arabic: إِنَّ وَلِـِّۧيَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِي نَزَّلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَۖ وَهُوَ يَتَوَلَّى ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: inna waliyyiya al-lahu alladhī nazzala al-kitāba wahuwa yatawallā al-ṣāliḥīna
